prompt:
Generate a full-body, front-view portrait of character protagonist based on the following description, with a pure white background. The character should be centered in the image, occupying most of the frame. Gazing straight ahead. Standing with arms relaxed at sides. Natural expression.
Features: full-body character design, a Japanese high school boy standing center on pure white background, anime style, vibrant colors, no text / no symbols / no garbled characters / no words.

A teenage boy with an ordinary yet pleasant appearance. His face is oval-shaped with clear, gentle features. He has calm, observant brown eyes under neatly shaped eyebrows, a straight nose, and lips set in a neutral, thoughtful expression. His skin tone is a healthy, light warm tone. His overall demeanor is quiet and introspective, with an air of subtle curiosity and focus, fitting for a logical thinker.

He has medium-length, straight black hair that is neatly styled, with soft bangs falling just above his eyebrows and the sides trimmed neatly around his ears. The hairstyle is typical of a diligent Japanese student.

He is wearing the standard summer uniform of a Japanese private high school: a crisp, short-sleeved white dress shirt with the top button undone, tucked into dark gray slim-fit trousers. The shirt is made of lightweight cotton. Around his neck hangs a simple, dark blue necktie, loosely knotted. On his feet are clean, black leather loafers. The uniform is slightly rumpled, suggesting a long day.

The character design embodies an ordinary student caught in an extraordinary situation, with a design that is detailed, authentic to the setting, and visually appealing within the anime aesthetic., full body, standing pose, arms relaxed at sides, pure white background, character centered, no text, no symbols, no garbled characters, no words
Style: anime
No text, no symbols, no watermark, no garbled characters, no words.
